text: Breithorn (elevation ) is a summit in the Steinernes Meer of the Berchtesgaden Alps in the Austrian state of Salzburg. == Alpinism == The Breithorn stands 1300 m above Saalfelden, with neighbors Persailhorn and Mitterhorn to the West. To the North the plateau of the Steinernes Meer follows. The fastest route to the summit is from the Riemann Hut (Riemannhaus) in about 1.5 hours. Category:Mountains of the Alps Category:Two-thousanders of Austria
title: Breithorn (Steinernes Meer)
